### Feature Description
A clear and concise description of the feature you are requesting.

### Problem It Solves
Explain what problem this feature would solve or what improvement it brings.

### Proposed Solution
Describe how you think the feature could be implemented.

### Alternatives Considered
Describe any alternative solutions or features you considered.

### Additional Context
Add any other context, mockups, or examples.
